# `onTokenChanged()`

Use `nhost.auth.onTokenChanged` to add a custom function that runs every time the access or refresh token is changed.

```ts
nhost.auth.onTokenChanged(() =>
  console.log('The access and refresh token has changed')
)
```

## Parameters

---

**<span className="parameter-name">fn</span>** <span className="optional-status">required</span> [`OnTokenChangedFunction`](/reference/docgen/javascript/nhost-js/types/on-token-changed-function)

---
